metadata.rationale: Extracted from canonical script and scene co-occurrence data.

data.description: Liliane is the Saks Fifth Avenue sales manager, a slight woman in her 60s who is exquisitely coiffed and from the pre-plastic surgery generation, wearing her age gracefully. She is gracious, kind, and accommodating to her wealthy clients, embodying old-world elegance and professional discretion. She manages the exclusive after-hours shopping experience with quiet efficiency and warmth.
data.dialogue_summary: Liliane's dialogue is brief but consistently warm and professional. She greets Cassandra and Dante with gracious familiarity, defers entirely to Cassandra's authority ('Of course, Ms. Constantine. It will be my absolute pleasure.'), and closes the encounter by warmly welcoming Dante into the fold of Saks clientele and offering to have her new wardrobe delivered. Her speech is polished, courteous, and service-oriented throughout.

explicit_evidence.quote: It was lovely to meet you, Dante. Any friend of Ms. Constantine is a friend of ours. Please come see us for anything you need.
explicit_evidence.source_scene: EXT. SAK'S FIFTH AVE FRONT ENTRANCE - CONTINUOUS

explicit_evidence.quote: Of course, Ms. Constantine. It will be my absolute pleasure.
explicit_evidence.source_scene: EXT. SAK'S FIFTH AVE FRONT ENTRANCE - CONTINUOUS

explicit_evidence.quote: They will be delivered to your office today. Would you like your original clothing delivered as well?
explicit_evidence.source_scene: EXT. SAK'S FIFTH AVE FRONT ENTRANCE - CONTINUOUS

explicit_evidence.quote: Liliane shakes Dante's hand with both her hands. She has pressed her personal business card into Dante's hand.
explicit_evidence.source_scene: EXT. SAK'S FIFTH AVE FRONT ENTRANCE - CONTINUOUS

explicit_evidence.quote: LILIANE, (slight, 60-something, exquisitely coiffed female), is from the pre-plastic surgery generation and wears her age gracefully.
explicit_evidence.source_scene: EXT. SAK'S FIFTH AVE FRONT ENTRANCE - CONTINUOUS

inferred_traits.rationale: Liliane accepts the Black Visa card without question, follows Cassandra's instructions without comment, and manages the entire makeover process smoothly, suggesting she is accustomed to handling wealthy, demanding clients with complete discretion.
Cassandra entrusts Liliane with her Black Visa card and the task of outfitting Dante without supervision, implying a long-standing and trusted professional relationship.

Her manner of greeting, leading Dante by the arm, pressing her business card into Dante's hand, and standing at the door smiling and nodding goodbye all reflect a refined, old-fashioned sense of hospitality.

Despite Cassandra's brusque behavior on the phone and the provocative nature of the clothing selected, Liliane remains composed and pleasant throughout, suggesting she reserves no judgment about her clients or their choices.

data.name: LILIANE

relationships.evidence: Cassandra hands Liliane her Black Visa card without explanation; Liliane addresses her as 'Ms. Constantine' and follows her directives without question. Cassandra calls her 'a gem.'
relationships.relationship_type: Loyal, long-standing professional service relationship; Cassandra is a valued VIP client

relationships.evidence: Liliane leads Dante through the makeover, shakes her hand with both hands, presses her personal business card into Dante's palm, and invites her to return for anything she needs.
relationships.relationship_type: Newly introduced client; warm and welcoming professional acquaintance

scene_presence: EXT. SAK'S FIFTH AVE FRONT ENTRANCE - CONTINUOUS
